guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

body:
I may disagree with their beliefs, but I don’t wish death and organ harvesting on them. 

If Muslims didn’t want to conquer and subjugate all nonbelievers, I wouldn’t be as bothered about them. 

However I am opposed to those that would take my freedoms away.

body: Christians are being persecuted here in America. The supreme court has taken away our right to influence with our vote the laws surrounding abortion, transitioning and gay marriage. The constitution in no way makes provisions for gay marriage, abortion and transitioning and the idea that it does is absurd.

body:
![](https://i.imgur.com/yhuN737.png)

I've never read a Scofield Bible, and I'm not a church sheep. But you must be if you think the Bible is about the supremacy of the aryan race and Hitler's glorious regime. In fact, Jesus would almost certainly be considered part of the jewish race, at least by birthright. And many of His followers were also of the jewish race.

body: Do you not realize that you are like the Pharisees? They thought their race was special. You think the aryan race is special. They made up all kinds of silly rules that were impossible to follow and pointed fingers when others failed them, yet they themselves couldn't follow them. They claimed to be good, righteous people, overflowing with pride, both in themselves and their corrupt community. I can't speak for you, but most National Socialists do the same.
